src:
Bibras Natho "ubio" derbi! Partizan pokerom uništio bezopasnu Vojvodinu (VIDEO)
Drugi put u šest dana crno-beli na svom stadionu slavili 4:0, uz dva pogotka Izraelca, uverljivo izdanje Sadika i lepoticu Zdjelara
02 Nov 2019 by Aleksandar Joksić
Oporavak. Mesec dana drmala je snažna temperatura fudbalere Partizana, pretio je grip da ih obori s nogu, da bi doktor iz Izraela prepisao pakovanje antibiotika i sa dve pilule smirio širenje virusa Humskom ulicom. Birbras Natho, za koga publika crno-beloj strani Topčiderskog brda kaže kako doktorskim potezima razigrava tim, hirurški precizno delio je lopte i sam sebe promovisao u ključnu fuguru derbija 15. superligaškog kola sa Vojvodinom - 4:0.
Na davno postavljenu dijagnozu kako osvajaču Kupa Srbije realizacija predstavlja uočljiv i ponekad teško rešiv problem, nekadašnji as moskovskog CSKA i Olimpijakosa odgovorio je tako što je maltene sam utabao stazu ka obaranju Novosađana, do ove runde najuspešnijeg tima elitnog karavana u gostima. Ne (samo) zbog golova, Natho je zdravstveni karton dopisao tri boda, za prekid krize posle čak četiri poraza, tri ligaška, u oktobru mesecu.
Ispostavilo se da je iskusni vezista usmerio Parni valjak ka prekidu loših rezultata u poslednje vreme, jer je dominantnim izdanjem u polju opravdao reči Sava Miloševića kako je lider ekipe i ponudio Grobarima razloge da veruju kako će u nastavku sezone, pre svega na evropskoj sceni, u njemu dobiti aduta sposobnog da rešava mečeve. Prvo uspešno realizovan jedanaesterac posle starta Mladena Devetka nad Bojanom Ostojićem, pa egzeklucija na pas Umara Sadika, koji je izdržao Sinišu Seničanina na leđima i asistirao za komotno vođstvo domaćina već u prvom delu.
Osim onoga što mu nije osnovni posao, mada je došao do čak šestog gola u sezoni, Bibras Natho je srca oko 2.000 Grobara zagrejao načinom na koji  je razigravao saigrače, obavezno gurao loptu napred, pronalazio pravovremena i tačna rešenja i po svim kriterijumima zaslužio snažan aplauz kad je Milošević u 59. rešio da ga sačuva za gostovanje Mančesteru.


























Odmah posle Natha, po zaslugama, pozicionirao se Umar Sadik. Nigerijac je bio znatno pokretljiviji nego pre tri dana na Banovom brdu, igrao je za tim, propustio loptu baš na Nathov pas da bi je neobjašnjivo promašio Miletić (imao još jednu priliku glavom), istrčavao kontre - posle jedne se digla bura u Humskoj, ali je snimak pokazao da nije bilo faula Marka Đurišića - stigao da podeli dve asistencije, jer je posle Bibrasa ostavio loptu i Saši Zdjelaru za najlepši detalj derbiju, da bi odličnu partiju krunisao efektinim pogotkom pošto je okrenuo Đurića i savladao Rockova.
Baš taj fenomenalan pogodak Zdjelara, verovatno konkurent za najlepši u sezoni, zapečatio je sudbinu Lala i potvrdio da je ovu pobedu kreirao Partizanov vezni red, kojim je u završnih pola sata dirigovao Sejduba Suma. Upravo su između dva kaznena prostora crno-beli dobili bitku sa Novosađanima, nadsvisili Drinčića i Bojića, a napadače Ezea i Bojana Matića, kao i krilo Ognjena Đuričića ostavili skoro bez šanse.
Upravo je Đuričić u 57. minutu, posle greške Ostojića i istrčavanja Stojkovića, uputio prvi udarac ka golu crno-belih. I pogodio spoljni deo mrećže. Sve pre toga bilo je toliko bezopasno i neučinkovito da gosti iz Novog Sada mogu da pevaju što su primili samo četiri gola. Nisu dali nijedan, iako je tek u 76. minutu Nikola Drinčić, prepoznatljivom slobodnim udarcem, zagrejao Vladimira Stojkovića. Nedovoljno čak i za počasni pogodak.
Kao pre šest dana, opet je bilo 4:0 u Humskoj...



 










SUPERLIGA SRBIJE, 15. KOLO

PARTIZAN – VOJVODINA 4:0/Natho 29pen, Natho 43, Zdjelar 48, Sadik 69/
BeogradStadion PartizanaSudija: Miloš Đorđić
Partizan: Stojković – Miletić, Ostojić, Pavlović, Urošević – Zdjelar, Šćekić (od 77. L. Pavlović) – F. Stevanović, Natho (od 59. Suma), Asano – Sadik (od 74. Ivanović).Vojvodina: Rockov – Veselinović, Đurić, Saničanin, Devetak – Drinčić, Đurišić (od 61. Topić) – Đuričin, Bojić, Eze (od 61. Gemović) – Matić (od 61. Nikolić).

SRBIJA 1 - 15. KOLO:

Nedelja

text:
Bibras Natho Derby! Partizan destroys harmless Vojvodina by poker (VIDEO)
For the second time in six days black and whites in their stadium celebrated 4-0, with two hits by the Israeli, a convincing release by Sadik and the beauty of the Herald
02 Nov 2019 by Aleksandar Joksic
Recovery. For months, Partizan football players were shaking, the flu threatened to knock them off, and an Israeli doctor prescribed a pack of antibiotics and slowed down the spread of the virus with two pills along Hum Street. Birbras Natho, whom the audience tells the black-and-white side of Topcider Hill as he plays the team with his doctor's moves, surgically distributed the balls and promoted himself into a key fugue of the 15th Super League league derby with Vojvodina - 4-0.
A long time ago diagnosis that the winner of the Serbian Cup was a noticeable and sometimes difficult to solve problem, the former ace of the Moscow CSKA and Olympiacos responded by striding the path towards the downfall of the Novosadans, to this round of the most successful team of elite caravan away. Not (just) because of the goals, Natho added three points to the medical record for ending the crisis after four defeats, three league games, in October.
It turns out that the experienced midfielder has steered the Steam Roller towards breaking bad results lately, as he justified the words of Savo Milosevic as the team's leader in the field, and offered the Grobars reasons to believe that in the continuation of the season, especially on the European stage, get him a trump card capable of handling matches. The first penalty was successfully completed after Mladen Devetko's start over Bojan Ostojic, then the execution on Umar Sadik's pass, which kept Sinisa Senicanin on his back and assisted for a comfortable lead in the first part.
In addition to what is not his primary job, even though he made it to the sixth goal of the season, Bibras Natho warmed the hearts of about 2,000 grave players with the way he played his teammates, made sure to push the ball forward, find timely and accurate solutions and deserve strong applause by all criteria. when Milosevic decided in 59 to save him for a visit to Manchester.


























Immediately after Nath, by merit, Umar Sadik positioned himself. The Nigerian was much more mobile than three days ago at Ban's Hill, played for the team, missed the ball just to Nath's pass to be inexplicably missed by Miletic (had another chance with his head), ran counter - after one a storm in Humska, but the shot showed that there was no foul by Marko Djurisic - he arrived to split two assists, because after Bibras left the ball and Sasha Zdjelar for the best detail of the derby, to crown the great game with an effective goal after turning Djuric and defeating Rock.
It was this phenomenal hit by Zdjelar, probably the competitor for the most beautiful of the season, that sealed Lal's fate and confirmed that this victory was created by Partizan midfielder, conducting Sejdub Suma in the final half hour. It was precisely between the two penalty areas that the Black and Whites won the battle with the Novi Sad, overpowered Drincic and Bojic, leaving the attackers Eze and Bojan Matic, as well as the wing of Ognjen Djuricic, almost without a chance.
It was Djuricic in the 57th minute, after a mistake by Ostojic and a run out of Stojkovic, who made the first shot towards the goal of black and white. And hit the outside of the net. Everything before that was so harmless and ineffective that guests from Novi Sad could sing that they received only four goals. They did not give any, although only in the 76th minute Nikola Drincic, with a recognizable free kick, warmed Vladimir Stojkovic. Not even enough for an honorary shot.
Like six days ago, it was again 4-0 in Hum ...

Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic (from 61. Topic) - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze (from 61. Gemovic) - Matic (from 61. Nikolic).
